A Look into ‘Healthy Aging’ - Exploring older patients (65+) that are up to date with clinical preventative measures

  • A Look into ‘Healthy Aging’ - Exploring older patients (65+) that are up to date with clinical preventative measures
  • bcliff@gmu.edu
  • Bcliffwm

This site will be used for our final project, a blog about healthcare analytics. The main topic will be focusing on the trends of men and women's compliance with CDC preventative measure guidelines.
